definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
to honor sb as a God (idiom); to revere/to worship/to deify/to make a holy cow of sth/to put sb on a pedestal
to hold sb in the same regard as one would a god (idiom)

sentences.english: "city god"), a deity in Chinese Daoist mythology who is responsible for the affairs of the city.
sentences.chinese: 城隍是中国道教神话中守护城池的神明。

sentences.english: You will not be gobbled by a super-god.
sentences.chinese: 您没有会被一个超级神明所渤鲁。

sentences.english: In the first age, we created gods.
sentences.chinese: 第一时代，我们创造了神明。

sentences.english: Today, during religious festivals, two large lanterns are hung above the altar of the gods.
sentences.chinese: 今天迎神赛会上，神明的阵头前仍有两盏大灯笼。

sentences.english: His pronouncements were cited with awe by our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 我们的中国东道主们对他的每句话都奉若神明。

sentences.english: Valentino was virtually deified by legions of female fans.
sentences.chinese: 瓦伦蒂诺几乎被众多的女性崇拜者奉若神明。

sentences.english: In Congress as on television, generals are treated with awed respect, service members spoken of as if they were saints.
sentences.chinese: 在电视直播的国会讲话中，将军们被敬若神明。

sentences.english: The ancestor- and spirit-worship of Chinese folk religion is individualized to families only.
sentences.chinese: 那些中国民间的祖先神明只是对家庭而已。

sentences.english: Temple, which is within the Poseidon empress sea fishermen sacrifice the gods places.
sentences.chinese: 庙内供奉海神娘娘，是出海渔民祭祀神明的场所。

sentences.english: Cadmus gave thanks and, stooping down, kissed the foreign soil, then lifting his eyes, greeted the surrounding mountains.
sentences.chinese: 卡德摩斯谢过神明，躬身亲吻这片异乡的土地，然后。

sentences.english: A god emitted lightning and thunder.
sentences.chinese: 神明发出了雷声和闪电。
他们不再把伟大领袖奉若神明。

sentences.english: Since you take refuge in the Dharma, you shouldn"t harm any sentient beings."
sentences.chinese: 自皈依佛，不可同任何外道，神明护法来作究竟皈依。

sentences.english: The speaker has internalized the authority of the god of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 叙述者把神明的权威内在化了。

sentences.english: Many Childern were Killed in Uganda to Sacrifice the God.
sentences.chinese: 乌干达发生用儿童祭祀神明事件。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
